nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member highFrequencyOutput is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the highFrequencyOutput analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: highFrequencyOutputAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the highFrequencyOutput analysis member.

var.name: kineticEnergyAtSurface
var.description: kinetic energy at surface

var.name: vertGMvelocitySFC
var.description: vertical velocity due to GM parameterization

var.name: vertTransportVelocitySFC
var.description: vertical velocity due to normal transport velocity divergence

var.name: vertVelSFC
var.description: vertical velocity due to normal velocity divergence

var.name: vertGMvelocityAt250m
var.description: vertical velocity due to GM parameterization at approximately 250m

var.name: vertTransportVelocityAt250m
var.description: vertical velocity due to normal transport velocity divergence at approximately 250m

var.name: vertVelAt250m
var.description: vertical velocity due to normal velocity divergence at approximately 250m

var.name: normalVelAt250m
var.description: normal velocity at approximately 250m

var.name: tangentialVelAt250m
var.description: tangential velocity at approximately 250m

var.name: BruntVaisalaFreqTopAt250m
var.description: Brunt Vaisala Frequency at approximately 250m

var.name: kineticEnergyAt250m
var.description: kinetic energy at a depth of approximately 250 m

var.name: barotropicSpeed
var.description: speed = sqrt(2*ke), where kinetic energy is computed from barotropic velocity = sum(h*u)/sum(h) over the full depth of an edge

var.name: columnIntegratedSpeed
var.description: speed = sum(h*sqrt(2*ke)), where ke is kineticEnergyCell and the sum is over the full column at cell centers.

var.name: relativeVorticityAt250m
var.description: relative vorticity at cell centers at a depth of approximately 250 m

var.name: divergenceAt250m
var.description: divergence at cell centers at a depth of approximately 250 m

var.name: divergenceTransportVelAt250m
var.description: divergence of transport velocity at cell centers at a depth of approximately 250 m

var.name: relativeVorticityVertexAt250m
var.description: relative vorticity at cell vertices at a depth of approximately 250 m

var.name: temperatureAt250m
var.description: ocean temperature at 250 m

var.name: salinityAt250m
var.description: salinity at 250 m

var.name: temperatureAtBottom
var.description: ocean temperature at bottom

var.name: salinityAtBottom
var.description: salinity at bottom

var.name: kineticEnergyAtBottom
var.description: kinetic energy at cell centers at bottom

var.name: relativeVorticityAtBottom
var.description: relative vorticity at cell centers at bottom

var.name: divergenceAtBottom
var.description: divergence at cell centers at bottom

var.name: temperatureAvgTopto0100
var.description: ocean temperature averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: salinityAvgTopto0100
var.description: salinity averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: temperatureAvg0100to0250
var.description: ocean temperature averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: salinityAvg0100to0250
var.description: salinity averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: temperatureAvg0250to0700
var.description: ocean temperature averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: salinityAvg0250to0700
var.description: salinity averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: temperatureAvg0700to2000
var.description: ocean temperature averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: salinityAvg0700to2000
var.description: salinity averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: temperatureAvg2000toBottom
var.description: ocean temperature averaged between surface and 100 m

var.name: salinityAvg2000toBottom
var.description: salinity averaged between surface and 100 m
